row.process:
:SET &RET = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,'RETCODE') :PRINT 'Return Code=&RET'
:IF &RET = '255' : PRINT 'LDAP Connection issue between UC4 host and Jenkins host. Waiting 60 seconds before re-starting again.' : WAIT 60 : SET &RESTART# = RESTART_UC_OBJECT(&$NAME#, &$RUNID#,,,) :ELSE : IF &RET = '3' : PRINT 'Jenkins Pipeline DOES NOT EXIST, please verify pipeline name prior to re-starting.' : ELSE : IF &RET = '2' : PRINT 'Jenkins Pipeline FAILURE, please check Jenkins pipeline console for failure reason.' : ELSE : PRINT 'SUCCESSFUL EXECUTION OF Jenkins Pipeline' : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
